title: Simple Types
description: This is an example schema with examples for multiple types and their constraints.

string_unconstrained.description: A simple string, without any constraints.

string_length.description: A string with minumum and maximum length

string_pattern.description: A string following a regular expression

interger_constrained.description: Just a whole number. I don't like fractions. Don't get too small
